ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tools to perform analyses and combine results from multiple-imputation datasets.
Tools to perform analyses and combine results from multiple-imputation datasets.

name: r-mitools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mitools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mitools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mitools/mitools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f204f3774e29d79810f579f128de892539518f2cbe6ed237e08c8e7283155d30

build:
  number: 6
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mitools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mitools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mitools
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Tools to perform analyses and combine results from multiple-imputation datasets.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: mitools
# Title: Tools for Multiple Imputation of Missing Data
# Version: 2.4
# Author: Thomas Lumley
# Description: Tools to perform analyses and combine results from multiple-imputation datasets.
# Maintainer: Thomas Lumley <t.lumley@auckland.ac.nz>
# Suggests: RODBC, foreign
# Imports: DBI, methods, stats
# License: GPL-2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-04-25 22:44:21 UTC; tlum005
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-26 05:00:03 UTC
